input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Christmas Tree Skirt"
Reference Product Description:
Usher in the warmth and charm of the holiday season with National Tree Company's Christmas Tree Collar. This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement. The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece. Constructed with strong polyester materials, this seasonal decoration is sturdy and durable, allowing it to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Place this adorable skirt around the base of your tree to add a festive feel to any family room or living space. At National Tree Company, we strive to create high quality Christmas decorations to help you transform your home so you can keep making every holiday moment magical.

This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement.
The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Set aside 45-60 minutes to properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories do not have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Hill 48" Plush Braid Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Uten Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Christmas Traditions Border Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Etta Avenue Rumi Christmas Fur Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 72" Gold Quilted Christmas Tree Skirt with Iridescent Sequins'
  - Name='Glitzhome 24"L Red Merry Christmas Wooden Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='Gardenised Large Rattan Collar Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight Christmas Traditions Scalloped Edge Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Black and Gold Velveteen Floral Scallop Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight Sequin Snowflake Mini Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Etta Avenue Sariyah 54" Colorway Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Gerson International 48-in Red Acrylic Pom Pom Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 38" Green Scalloped Edge Round Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Celebrate It Mesh 12" x 11.6yd.'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Burlap Plaid Tree Skirt with Christmas Puddings'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 60 Wine Luxe Embroidered Velvet Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Aqua Shield Waterhog Pine Tree Skirt Mat'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Boucl√© Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Gardenised Large Rattan Collar Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Etta Avenue Maleah Plaid Velvet Tree Skirt'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Christmas Reindeer Snowflake Plaid Rustic Embroidered Linen Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Glitzhome 24"L Red Merry Christmas Wooden Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='Glitzhome Knitted Christmas Tree Skirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 48" Plush Braid Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a tree skirt similar in function to the reference product, designed to surround the base of a Christmas tree, though the style and material differ somewhat.
